website_summaries.verdict: Provides a great grip for a great price. However, it does not come with an arch bar.
pros: Features square-shaped tread pattern, raised middle arch, and one-inch tail kick
Grips come in three pieces for customization

customer_reviews.title: Best Pad ever
customer_reviews.text: Really good pad, I tested it out today. It has such a great grip and cushion as well. I am a Former WQS competitor, still competing professionally on Local Pro contests in San Diego, CA. I would like to request a sponsorship if you have any room in your company, I would love to promote your products and help expand your sales. You can follow my Instagram account @aksurfacademy. Thank you, Alex Kamkoff Pro Surfer Owner and Founder of AKSurfAcademy Surf Coach and Instructor My contact information is alex_kamkoff@hotmail.com (760)331-7144 Address: 117 Rosebay Dr Apt # 23 Encinitas, CA 92024
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Alex Kamkoff

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but doest last long
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few surf sessions and looks great. Will see how it ages. Well it didn’t age well. After 6 months and about 20 sessions when duck diving in overhead waves that were hollow the back part broke off , the part where you put your toes when you duck dive. First pad this ever happens to for me. Also the top of the pad is slowly rubbing off too. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Only been out for two sessions, but still going strong! Mind you, I have it slapped on my 5’10” Boardworks Froth 17’ (Soft Top). I will update this review as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: MattAzpi

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: This pad works great. You won't notice a difference in performance from the real surf brand pads that cost more. I would recommend this pad if you aren't worried about who's checking out which brand gear you have.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product, have used it the last 2 days
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, have used it the last 2 days. Fixed my back foot traction problem. If you haven't applied this before make sure your board is clean and wax free. Overclean your board even. You only get one shot at applying this stuff. The glue is very strong, traction pad feels solid. Also the price was about half of the name brand pads.
customer_reviews.author: M. wagenvoord

customer_reviews.title: Great Pad
customer_reviews.text: I have had the pad on my board for over a year. This is actually the second one I bought. The first was is great. Does not come off like some of the other inexpensive pads on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my sons board. He has a dark blue board so the white looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome product. One stuck on couldn’t come up again. It is really cool because it is raised about an inch. Really gives you nice leverage on your deck of your board. Or it can become icy as well while you’re sitting down on the board
customer_reviews.author: Paulie AMZN

customer_reviews.title: Tail kick pad..
customer_reviews.text: Put on 9' 6" surf sup...works great..packaged good...make sure u apply straight first time..won't get second chance..
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Great value, perfectly effective, and holds up to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: RJV5057

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid Pad. looks like every DK one ive had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: name mark

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: The grip pad came on very sturdy cardboard to ensure the product didn't bend at all during shipping. It was incredibly easy to apply to the surfboard and it sticks great in the water. The foam feels great and provides fantastic traction. I couldn't be happier with the product
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Barker

customer_reviews.title: Good company to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very quick and the Stomp Pads seem like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: DerekM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Traction Pad and cool color too!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a plain white old board I had to spice up the looks as well as save me some wax. Looks great and surfs great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: The grip is excellent for his feet and the product is easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. I bought it for my 12 year old who is learning to surf. The grip is excellent for his feet and the product is easy to place on the board. Great product. I love the differect colors, although the black went well with the color of his board. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try out!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't attached this to my board yet BUT if anything that'll help my pup not slip off the front of my board every 5 mins is very exciting! I'll leave another review once we have tried it out!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ruffini

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Arrived in pristine conditions. I’m very happy I chose this option.
customer_reviews.author: DNEVER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had on skimboard for a week or so. solid kickpad no problems
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and provides extra traction I need on the tail.
customer_reviews.author: Manali Dighe

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the free wax scraper
customer_reviews.text: Killer kick pad! Love the color and the free wax scraper, bottle opener, fin key combo device!
customer_reviews.author: David Scheetz

customer_reviews.title: Great traction pad. No problems. Sticks perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Price was awesome. It looks great on the surfboard and is as good or better than any other traction I've used. Warranty seems to be unbeatable. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: maria ramberger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making a hybrid board
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pad! Looks great and you can't beat the price. Definitely our favorite for our wake surf board set ups
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Looks good, works well. I have some concerns about how long it will last but for the price you can’t bet it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Klein

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up well
customer_reviews.text: The orange part started to delaminate within 10 minutes of its first use
customer_reviews.author: Alec brown

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: 15 hours of hard surfing and holding strong. Put it to the test surfing it right after application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so great. Easy to apply and had a full day of surfing. Love the red.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2boys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All positive fast and fun . Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rupley

product_meta.title: Own the Wave 3-Piece Customisable Grip Pad with 3M Adhesive. Guaranteed to Stick on All Boards: Surfboards, Shortboards, Longboards, Skim Boards. Choose Color
product_meta.description:
Own the Wave 3-PIECE Customisable Grip Pad with 3M Adhesive
Guaranteed to Stick on ALL Boards: Surfboards, Shortboards, Longboards, Skim Boards


 * Be amazed with these incredibly light traction pads from ‘Own the Wave’. Trialled, tested and thrashed to ensure you get the highest quality your feet deserve. Features ultra-light EVA foam weighing less than 100 grams / 3.5 ounces. Plus an additional savings when you choose to buy pads with the combined wax comb, bottle opener and hex key (worth $8 on its own).
   
 * Own the Wave grips are carefully packaged with a firm cardboard backing to make sure they get to you in perfect condition.
   
 *  Featuring a square shaped tread pattern, a raised middle arch and a 1 inch tail kick you can be sure of a crazy grip and you'll know your back foot will be planted. 
   
 * The grips come in three pieces so the overall size and appearance is customisable; pad is 315mm long at its longest point, and 300mm wide at the widest point. Of course, they feature market leading 3M adhesive for the ultimate stick. A great variety of colors to choose from: Arctic White, Charcoal Black, Bright Blue, Bright Red, Dark Grey, Green, and Orange.
   
 * Buy with complete confidence as all ‘Own the Wave’ products are stored and shipped (quickly and reliably) to you by Amazon in the US and are 100% guaranteed - If it doesn't deliver what it is supposed to at any time within 12 MONTHS of purchase, it will be replaced or you'll be refunded - your choice. Thank you for looking at a product from our store - Surf and Snow Warehouse. We are a small family business that ONLY sells what we know and love – water sports gear. We know our products, use our products, and stand behind them 100% - So if you have any questions about using any of our products please just ask. Thank you.
   
 *
